thread.title: Vicky Pattison strips completely NAKED and shows off slim figure in as she enjoys a soak in the bath

author: Marcus BARNES
title: Vicky Pattison strips completely NAKED and shows off slim figure in as she enjoys a soak in the bath
text:
TV Magazine Rear-ly hot Vicky Pattison strips completely NAKED and shows off slim figure in as she enjoys a soak in the bath 
Geordie Shore star posted saucy snap in aid of Hump Day By Marcus Stinson Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments VICKY Pattison celebrated ‘hump day’ by posting a photo of herself naked in the bath to her Instagram account today. 
The 29-year-old Geordie Shore star lays on her side in the steamy snap, showcasing her slender frame. Instagram 5 Vicky Pattison posted this image of herself nude in the bath to celebrate Hump Day 
In the shot, taken by her photographer friend Hannah Furness, Vicky’s breasts are submerged under the bath though her pert rear sits just above the surface of the water. 
She smoulders at the camera with her face professionally enhanced with make up. 
The pic was posted to celebrate ‘Hump Day’, typically noted by Americans as being the midpoint of the working week, after which point the weekend is only a couple of days away. 
Hump day is used as an excuse by many famous Instagram users to post photos of their backsides, much to the delight of their followers. 
Vicky recently revealed that she has lost two stone in six weeks , thanks to a strict regime of exercise and eating healthily. James Rudland The TV star has been on a weight loss regime, shedding two stone in six weeks FAME FLYNET 5 Vicky left Geordie Shore in 2014 
Earlier this week Vicky revealed the pivotal moment that led her to quitting Geordie Shore – claiming she was banned from reading books. 
Vicky left the show in 2014 after a three year stint, and told the Daily Star she had a wake-up call when she was chastised for going “off-brand” and wanting to read a book in bed. 
She told the newspaper: “This person is saying: ‘Vicky’s got a book, where did Vicky get a book from, get it off her.’ 
“He was like: ‘Vicky, where did you get your book from?’ And I said WHSmith, and he said: ‘What are you doing? You can’t read a book, it’s not on-brand.’ 
“And I was like: ‘Are you f***ing joking me? I can’t read a book?'” News Group Newspapers Ltd The 29-year-old has since gone on to win I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here Lastest TV & Showbiz FLIRT ALERT Charlotte Crosby admits she likes to ‘flirt’ with Stephen Bear but insists she’s still SINGLE after ‘romantic’ trip to Barcelona with Celebs Go Dating love rat LIFE SHORE IS GOOD Gaz Beadle and Emma McVey pack on the PDA as they frolic in the water in tiny bikinis on holiday in Dubai Reality King Who is Aaron Chalmers? Marnie Simpson's ex who has SLAMMED Lewis Bloor HOLIDAY SOS DIY SOS host Nick Knowles' reveals his holiday plans to Dublin have been RUINED by Storm Doris DORIS ON THE COBBLES Coronation Street crisis as Storm Doris stops soap from filming major Rosie Webster storyline ARE YOUR EARS BURNING KATIE? Carol McGiffin eyes up return to Loose Women... 'but only if they REMOVE certain panellists' MARTI'S BACK Fans will be pleased to hear Marti Pellow is back with a new tour and album - all you need to know about the Wet Wet Wet star DEATH IN THE DALES Is Emmerdale's Rhona Goskirk going to be KILLED by Pierce Harris? BRIT BLUNDER Mark Wright had an awkward moment when he bumped in to Little Mix backstage at the BRIT Awards ONE WAY OR ANOTHER Niall Horan confirms One Direction WILL get back together but he’s ‘not sure when’ Bra-vo! Katy Perry flashes her bra in completely sheer floral outfit as she dances with Ellie Goulding inside BRIT Awards 2017 after party ‘I got the mum sweats’ Giovanna Fletcher admits she CRIED during her first long haul flight with son Buzz 
The reality star called it quits soon afterwards and left the show for good. 
During her chat with the Daily Star, Vicky also condemned the state of the house she was forced to live in, claiming there were times where she would not be able to see the floor, and that bowls were left around the bedrooms for so long they would begin to grow mould. 
She added: “All I wanted was to lie there with my face mask on, in a room where I could see the floor and read my book. Instagram Vicky and her beau John Noble Geordie Shore star regrets having sex on TV 
"I think it was about Russia and the Second World War from the Russian perspective. 
"I just wanted to grow up and move on." 
Nowadays, Vicky spends time on screen as a presenter – and she was crowned Queen of the Jungle in 2015 as the winner of I’m a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here. 
During her time in the Australian outback, she was seen opening up about her regrets about having sex while in the Geordie Shore house.
